question.body: Think about a chicken. When you eat the breast meat it is white. This white meat is muscle. What type of muscle would it be?

multiple_choice.choice: It would be SO because chickens need to fly for long distances.
It would be FO because to be white in color there needs to be myoglobin.
It would be FG because chickens fly for only short quick amounts of time.

response.feedback: Incorrect. While SO would supply energy for long flights, chickens, especially farm raised ones for food, do not fly long distances and SO would be red in color.
Incorrect. Myoglobin lends to the red color of muscles.
Correct. FG fibers are white and used for fast actions.
